name: UFO Invasion
description:
This  game was made  to test ideas and learn Construct 2  software for a bigger game I am working on  , I think it came out kinda fun short Arcade shooter just shoot ufos get high score  ! 

You can Download or play in browser going to this link :

https://www.scirra.com/arcade/shooting-games/ufo-invasion-34169

The game plays with either Xbox controller or mouse and Keyboard

xbox  left stick moves  ship and right stick aims RT shoots

keyboard mouse  wasd or arrow keys move ship  mouse aim left click shoots

thats about it I might put a boss battle Idk , but enjoy !
